definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Discharging of the targeted fluorescent detection.
sentences.chinese: 出料段配置日光灯检测。

sentences.english: It was lit by hooded fluorescent lamps.
sentences.chinese: 照明用的是带灯罩的日光灯。

sentences.english: A typical fluorescent lamp is a tube with metal electrodes at each end.
sentences.chinese: 日光灯通常是一根两端装有金属电极的管子。

sentences.english: And avoid sunlamps and tanning booths.
sentences.chinese: 尽量避免使用日光灯和晒黑机。

sentences.english: If you haven’t switched to compact fluorescent bulbs, make the leap.
sentences.chinese: 如果您还没有改变，少用日光灯，那赶紧行动吧。

sentences.english: Electronic Ballast for Fluorescent lamp in Theater Project.
sentences.chinese: 运用日光灯之可调光电子安定器于剧场计划。

sentences.english: Using Dimmable Electronic Ballast for Fluorescent lamp in Theater Project.
sentences.chinese: 运用日光灯之可调光电子安定器于剧场计划。

sentences.english: I should really get one of these daylight lamps.
sentences.chinese: 我确实应该从那一堆日光灯里拿一个。

sentences.english: By morning time, cadres have consciously closed office fluorescent.
sentences.chinese: 而到了午休时间，机关干部们自觉关闭办公室日光灯。

sentences.english: If the camera is not synchronized with the lights, the image may flicker.
sentences.chinese: 如果照相机没有跟日光灯同步，图像可能会闪烁不定。

sentences.english: The first screw-in compact fluorescent bulb appeared in 1980.
sentences.chinese: 1980年出现了第一个螺旋式小型日光灯灯泡。

sentences.english: Features:During replacing with florescent light tube, the cover can be opened easily without use of any tool.
sentences.chinese: 换装日光灯时，免用工具即可轻易开启盖子。

sentences.english: "Hello, " Eloise said into the phone, without having turned the overhead light on.
sentences.chinese: “你好，”艾萝依没开日光灯对着电话讲。

sentences.english: Compact fluorescent bulbs last ten times longer than the incandescent variety.
sentences.chinese: 简洁的日光灯寿命是白炽灯的10倍以上。

sentences.english: The fluorescent lamp keeps flashing, which means it is already out of order.
sentences.chinese: 这日光灯持续闪烁著，这意味著它已经故障了。

sentences.english: Fluorescent is a low pressure mercury-smoke arc discharge lamp.
sentences.chinese: 日光灯是一种低气压的汞蒸气弧光放电灯。

definition: Taiwan variant of 熒光燈|荧光灯[ying2 guang1 deng1]
